/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/vkc.dir/main.cpp.o  -o vkc  /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -framework AGL -framework OpenGL /usr/local/lib/libGLEW.dylib -framework Cocoa -framework CoreVideo -framework IOKit -framework AGL -framework OpenGL /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a /usr/local/lib/libGLEW.dylib -lpthread -framework Cocoa -framework CoreVideo -framework IOKit -lpthread
